title: Vietnam Veterans sue to block proposed 'Independence Arch' near Arlington National Cemetery
description: The lawsuit challenges President Trump's plans for "Independence Arch," a 250-foot structure proposed for Memorial Circle.
content: The lawsuit challenges President Trump's plans for "Independence Arch," a 250-foot structure proposed for Memorial Circle.
